mapper.insert: insert into admin(adminName, password, nickName, email, status, createTime, adminImg) values (#{adminName}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{adminImg});
mapper.select: select adminName, nickName, email, status, createTime, loginTime from admin;
select id, adminName, password, nickName, email, status, adminImg from admin where adminName = #{adminName};
mapper.update: update admin set adminName = #{adminName}, nickName = #{nickName}, email = #{email}, status = #{status}, createTime = #{createTime}, loginTime = #{loginTime}, adminImg = #{adminImg};
